title: President Trump Announces the Head of the Presidential Delegation to the Republic of Korea to Attend the Closing Ceremony of the XXIII Olympic Winter Games  in PyeongChang, Gangwon Province, Republic of Korea â€“ The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			
Issued on:
February 5, 2018
President Donald J. Trump today announced the designation of the Head of the Presidential Delegation to the Republic of Korea to attend the Closing Ceremony and events of the 2018 PyeongChang Olympic Winter Games beginning Saturday, February 24, 2018.The Honorable Ivanka Trump, Assistant to the President and Advisor, will lead the delegation.
